sentences.sContent: Time and again we have scooped our rivals.
sentences.sCn: 我们一再抢在对手之前登出报道。

words.tran: 满满的一勺子；满满的一铲子

trans.tranCn: 舀出； 抢在之前报道新闻
trans.tranOther: to be the first newspaper to print an important news report
an important or exciting news story that is printed in one newspaper or shown on one television station before any of the others know about it
